languages.text: {n}Друкари длинной тонкой тенью нависает над пленником, в когтистых пальцах ксеноса что-то сверкает. Вы не до конца понимаете, что именно друкари делает с заговорщиком, но доносящихся до вас звуков и вида конвульсий, сотрясающих тело жертвы, достаточно, чтобы получить некое представление о той агонии, в которой пыточник топит свою жертву. Наконец, хмыкнув, Маражай возвращается к вам.{/n}

{n}Marazhai's long, slender silhouette looms over the prisoner, and you see something flash in his hands. You are unsure what exactly the Drukhari does to the man, but the sounds and the convulsions give you an idea of the agony in which the torturer drowns his victim. Eventually, Marazhai returns to you with a scoff.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Друкари длинной тонкой тенью нависает над пленником, в когтистых пальцах ксеноса что-то сверкает. languages.text: {n}La silueta alargada y delgada de Marazhai se yergue sobre el prisionero y ves que algo brilla en sus manos. No sabes qué le hace exactamente el Drukhari, pero los sonidos y convulsiones del hombre te dan una idea de la agonía que le provoca su tortura. Finalmente, Marazhai vuelve a tu lado con aire burlón.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's long, slender silhouette looms over the prisoner, and you see something flash in his hands. You are unsure what exactly the Drukhari does to the man, but the sounds and the convulsions give you an idea of the agony in which the torturer drowns his victim. Eventually, Marazhai returns to you with a scoff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La silueta alargada y delgada de Marazhai se yergue sobre el prisionero y ves que algo brilla en sus manos. No sabes qué le hace exactamente el Drukhari, pero los sonidos y convulsiones del hombre te dan una idea de la agonía que le provoca su tortura. Finalmente, Marazhai vuelve a tu lado con aire burlón.{/n}

languages.text: {n}マラズハイの細長いシルエットが囚人に迫り、彼の手の中で何かがピカッと光った。デュカーリが男に何をしているのかは定かではないが、その音と痙攣から、拷問する彼が被害者をどれほどの苦痛で苦しめているのかがうかがえる。やがて、マラズハイは軽蔑の表情を浮かべながら戻ってきた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's long, slender silhouette looms over the prisoner, and you see something flash in his hands. You are unsure what exactly the Drukhari does to the man, but the sounds and the convulsions give you an idea of the agony in which the torturer drowns his victim. Eventually, Marazhai returns to you with a scoff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイの細長いシルエットが囚人に迫り、彼の手の中で何かがピカッと光った。デュカーリが具体的に何をするのかはわからないが、その音と男がピクピクしていることから、拷問する彼が被害者を溺れさせて苦しめているのだと想像できる。やがて、マラズハイは嘲笑を浮かべながら戻ってきた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋瘦削的影子笼罩在犯人身上，你看到他手里有什么东西闪了一下。你不确定这个黑暗灵族到底对犯人做了什么，但犯人的哀嚎与抽搐让你觉得，他应该是用了某种方法对犯人施加了溺死的痛苦。到最后，玛拉斋脸上挂着嘲弄的神情，回到了你身边。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's long, slender silhouette looms over the prisoner, and you see something flash in his hands. You are unsure what exactly the Drukhari does to the man, but the sounds and the convulsions give you an idea of the agony in which the torturer drowns his victim. Eventually, Marazhai returns to you with a scoff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋瘦长的影子笼罩在犯人身上，你看到他手里有什么东西闪了一下。你不确定这个黑暗灵族到底对犯人做了什么，但犯人的哀嚎与抽搐让你觉得，他应该是用了某种方法对犯人施加了溺死的痛苦。到最后，玛拉斋脸上挂着嘲弄的神情，回到了你身边。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhais schlanke Silhouette ragt über dem Gefangenen auf, und du siehst etwas in seinen Händen funkeln. Du bist nicht ganz sicher, was der Drukhari dem Mann antut, doch die Geräusche und Zuckungen verschaffen dir eine gewisse Vorstellung davon, in welchen Qualen der Folterer sein Opfer ertränkt. Schließlich kehrt Marazhai zu dir zurück und räuspert sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's long, slender silhouette looms over the prisoner, and you see something flash in his hands. You are unsure what exactly the Drukhari does to the man, but the sounds and the convulsions give you an idea of the agony in which the torturer drowns his victim. Eventually, Marazhai returns to you with a scoff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais lange, dünne Silhouette ragt über dem Gefangenen auf, und du siehst etwas in seinen Händen blitzen. Du bist nicht ganz sicher, was der Drukhari dem Mann antut, doch die Geräusche und Zuckungen verschaffen dir eine gewisse Vorstellung davon, in welchen Qualen der Folterer sein Opfer ertränkt. Schließlich kehrt Marazhai zu dir zurück und räuspert sich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La silhouette longiligne de Marazhai surplombe le prisonnier de tout son haut, et vous apercevez un éclat métallique entre ses mains. Vous ne savez pas exactement quels tourments le Drukhari est en train d'infliger à sa victime, mais les sons qu'elle profère et les convulsions qui parcourent ses membres vous donnent une petite idée de l'agonie qui est la sienne. Au bout d'un moment, Marazhai finit par se retourner vers vous avec un grognement.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's long, slender silhouette looms over the prisoner, and you see something flash in his hands. You are unsure what exactly the Drukhari does to the man, but the sounds and the convulsions give you an idea of the agony in which the torturer drowns his victim. Eventually, Marazhai returns to you with a scoff.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La silhouette longiligne de Marazhaï surplombe le prisonnier de tout son haut, et vous apercevez un éclat métallique entre ses mains. Vous ne savez pas exactement quels tourments le Drukhari est en train d'infliger à sa victime, mais les sons qu'elle profère et les convulsions qui parcourent ses membres vous donnent une petite idée de l'agonie qui est la sienne. Au bout d'un moment, Marazhaï finit par se retourner vers vous avec un grognement.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın uzun boylu ve ince yapılı silüeti, mahkûmun üzerine çöküyor. Ellerinde parlayan bir şey görüyorsun. Drukhari'nin adama tam olarak ne yaptığından emin değilsin ancak şahit olduğun sesler ve spazmlar, işkencecinin kurbanına uyguladığı ızdıraba dair ipuçları veriyor. En nihayetinde Marazhai, alaycı bir ifadeyle yanına dönüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's long, slender silhouette looms over the prisoner, and you see something flash in his hands. You are unsure what exactly the Drukhari does to the man, but the sounds and the convulsions give you an idea of the agony in which the torturer drowns his victim. Eventually, Marazhai returns to you with a scoff.{/n}
